name: CheapShark - Game Deals
description: CheapShark is a price comparison website for digital PC Games. We keep track of prices across multiple stores including Steam, GreenManGaming, Fanatical, and many others.

api_methods.name: Stores Info
api_methods.description: Returns a full list of store IDs and names, a flag specifying if store is active, and an array of image/logo sizes (relative URLs)

api_methods.name: Multiple Game Lookup
api_methods.description: Allows lookup of a list of games. Includes list of all deals for each game. Maximum of 25 games.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of GameID's

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the deals for 'Cyberpunk 2077', 'The Witcher 3', and 'Red Dead Redemption 2'?
I want to see the current offers for 'Assassin's Creed Valhalla', 'Far Cry 6', and 'Halo Infinite'.
What are the latest discounts available for 'Doom Eternal', 'Resident Evil Village', and 'FIFA 22'?

I'd like to know the deals for 'Minecraft', 'Fortnite', and 'Apex Legends'.
Can you find the best prices for 'Grand Theft Auto V', 'Elden Ring', and 'Hades'?
Show me the current deals for 'Cyberpunk 2077', 'Hollow Knight', and 'Stardew Valley'.
I need the price details for 'The Sims 4', 'Among Us', and 'Terraria'.
What are the available discounts for 'Overwatch', 'Valorant', and 'League of Legends'?
Please list the deals for 'World of Warcraft', 'Diablo III', and 'StarCraft II'.

api_methods.name: Manage Alerts
api_methods.description: Send an email containing a link to manage your alerts.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Any valid email address

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to take on the price alert, set to `manage`

api_methods.name: List of Games
api_methods.description: Get a list of games that contain a given title or matches steamAppID. Response includes the cheapest current deal for each game.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Search for a game by title

parameters.name: exact
parameters.description:
Default `0`

Flag to allow only exact string match for `title` parameter

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Default `60`

The maximum number of games to return, up to `60`

parameters.name: steamAppID
parameters.description: Search for a game by Steam’s AppID - e.g. http://store.steampowered.com/app/35140/

utterances.utterance: Can you find the cheapest deals for the game 'Cyberpunk 2077'?
Show me the best price for the game with Steam App ID 570.
I want to see the cheapest offers for 'The Witcher 3' with an exact match.
List the top 10 cheapest deals for 'Assassin's Creed'.
Find the best price for the game 'Doom Eternal' with a limit of 5 results.
What are the cheapest deals for 'Red Dead Redemption 2'?
Get me the cheapest deal for the game with Steam App ID 730.
Show the cheapest offers for 'Halo Infinite' with an exact title match.
I want to see up to 20 cheapest deals for 'Final Fantasy XV'.
Find the best price for 'Resident Evil Village' with a maximum of 15 results.

api_methods.name: List of Deals
api_methods.description:
Get a paged list of deals matching any number of criteria, all the filtering parameters are optional.

The deal object is what drives most of what you see on the site. They are price + metadata properties for games for a given store. All dealID’s are encoded on the server. On your website/app, you will use the redirect page to link users to a specific deal:

> https://www.cheapshark.com/redirect?dealID={id}

**Important Note**: The redirect page is not an API endpoint and is not designed for automated access. It is purely a way to link your end users to deals.

The deal rating property provides a quick way to compare how 'good' a deal is. It is normalized on a scale from 0 to 10.

parameters.name: lowerPrice
parameters.description:
Default `0`

Only returns deals with a price *greater than* this value

parameters.name: steamRating
parameters.description: Minimum Steam reviews rating for a game

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Looks for the string contained anywhere in the game name

parameters.name: steamAppID
parameters.description: Look for deals on specific games, comma separated list of Steam App ID

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description:
Default `0`

Determines sort direction

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: Option to output deals in `RSS` format (overrides page number/size to `0`/`100`)

constraints.inter-dependency: output, pageNumber, pageSize: If output is 'RSS', pageNumber is set to 0 and pageSize is set to 100.

parameters.name: steamworks
parameters.description:
Default `0`

Flag to include only deals that redeem on Steam (best guess, depends on store support)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
Criteria to sort the list by, possible values -

- Deal Rating
- Title
- Savings
- Price
- Metacritic
- Reviews
- Release
- Store
- recent

parameters.name: AAA
parameters.description:
Default `0`

Flag to include only deals with retail price > `$29`

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The size of pages returned, default and maximum value is `60`

parameters.name: exact
parameters.description:
Default `0`

Flag to allow only exact string match for `title` parameter

parameters.name: upperPrice
parameters.description: Only returns deals with a price* less than or equal to` this value (`50` acts the same as no limit)

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The requested page number, 0 indexed, default of `0`

parameters.name: onSale
parameters.description:
Default `0`

Flag to include only games that are currently on sale

parameters.name: metacritic
parameters.description: Minimum Metacritic rating for a game

parameters.name: storeID
parameters.description: Comma separated list of store ID's to filter on, omit for deals from any store

utterances.utterance: Show me deals for games with a Metacritic rating of at least 80.
Find deals for games under $20 that are currently on sale.

List deals for the game with Steam App ID 12345 in RSS format.
Show me deals for games with the exact title 'The Witcher 3'.
Find deals for games with a Metacritic rating of at least 85 and sort them by deal rating.

api_methods.name: Game Lookup
api_methods.description: Gets info for a specific game. Response includes a list of all deals associated with the game.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An existing gameID

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the deals for the game with ID 612?
I want to know the current offers for the game identified by ID 745.
What are the available discounts for the game with the ID 890?
Find the best prices for the game that has the ID 1023.
Could you provide the deal information for the game with ID 567?
Show me the price comparison for the game with ID 234.
I need the list of deals for the game identified by ID 678.
What are the current deals for the game with the ID 345?
Can you get the offers for the game with ID 456?
Please find the deals for the game that has the ID 789.

api_methods.name: Edit Alert
api_methods.description: Set or remove a price alert.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to take on the price alert (`set` or `delete`)

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Any valid email address

parameters.name: gameID
parameters.description: An existing gameID

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: The price to wait for, only required when using `set` value for `action` parameter

constraints.inter-dependency: action, price: The price parameter is only required when the action is set to 'set'.

utterances.utterance: Please set a price alert for the game with ID 45 to notify me at john.doe@example.com when it drops to $19.99.
I want to delete the price alert for the game with ID 78. My email is jane.smith@example.com.

Set a price alert for game ID 67 to notify me at chris.martin@example.com when it falls to $12.00.
I need to remove the price alert for the game with ID 90. My email is laura.taylor@example.com.
Could you set a price alert for the game ID 12 to notify me at david.anderson@example.com when it drops to $7.75?

api_methods.name: Deal Lookup
api_methods.description: Get info for a specific deal. Response includes game info, any cheaper current deals, and the cheapest historical price. As elsewhere, dealID is encoded

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An Encoded Deal ID
